front.title: Use Case of Computing-Aware AI large model

abstract.t: AI models, especially AI large models have been fastly developed and widely deployed to serve the needs of users and multiple industries. Due to that AI large models involve mega-scale data and parameters, high consumption on computing and network resources, distributed computing becomes a natural choice to deploy AI large models. This document desribes the key concepts and deployment scenarios of AI large model, to demonstrate the necessity of considering computing and network resources to meet the requirements of AI tasks.
